text: Jerzy Głowacki (born 26 June 1950) is a Polish former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Poland Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kalisz
title: Jerzy Głowacki
